page.title: 17LOCAL NEWS REPORT
page.content: In the last two weeks local schools have held their annual Summer Fayres.Money was raised for purchasing school equipment by a variety of stalls,games and entertainments.A typical programme of events included bookstalls,tombola,bottle stall,raffles,"hook a duck",ring a goldfish bowl and skittle alleys.Children also rode horses and ponies,army jeeps,motorbikes and the new Sinclair battery operated car,the"C5". The crowds were entertained by Brass Bands whilst they enjoyed their cream teas. Part of the day's events included the old english customs of Maypole Dancing and Morris Dancing.
